Name: Abode
About the game: Be a vigilant detective! Explore and investigate every corner and detail of the worn down apartment. Find objects or items to inspect, search through boxes, drawers and furniture. Repair broken equipment or utilize items and furniture in the room in order to unveil all it's secrets. --------------------------------------------------------------------------- The gameplay is approximately 1hr long depending on how fast you solve the puzzles and how much you rush. VR Exclusive.
Meta Title: Abode: Dec 1, 2016, Overflow and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Abode? Check out the release date (Dec 1, 2016), developer insights from Overflow, and a complete game summary.
